code: import{Button,CloseButton,Grid,Image,Text,useToast}from"@chakra-ui/react";import React from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{removeMoveOrderItem}from"../Redux/Order/order.Action";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var OrderCard=function OrderCard(_ref){var item=_ref.item;var dispatch=useDispatch();var toast=useToast();var handleCancleOrder=function handleCancleOrder(id){dispatch(removeMoveOrderItem(id));toast({title:"Cancle Success.",description:"Order Item id: ".concat(id,"."),status:"success",duration:2000,isClosable:true});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{templateColumns:"repeat(4, 1fr)",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"space-between",p:4,width:"full",gap:2,mb:2,boxShadow:"lg",border:"2px solid white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{width:"100px",height:"100px",alt:item.title,src:item.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:item.qty}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{bg:"red.500",width:"100px",borderWidth:"1px",border:"1px solid white",size:"md",variant:"outline",_hover:"black",onClick:function onClick(){return handleCancleOrder(item._id);},children:"Delete"})]});};export default OrderCard;
